name: RollOut (itch) (Damon L. Wakes)
description:
Created for Dogpit Jam XII, with the theme The Odds are Good.

A few ideas sprang to mind for this particular theme, but ultimately I thought it would be interesting to do a Breakout-style game where the "balls" are less effective, but there are more of them. Also they sometimes explode, because shut up, that's why.

Mouse or touch will move the paddle, but dice can only break bricks with a lower value than their own. (You need to roll a six to break the red bricks with five dots on them, for example.) If you log in with gd.games using the banner on the title screen, you'll be able to submit your total time to the leaderboard.
